dc_description_s: Mounted cover title. Copperplate print in green. First copperplate printed map from the Meiji era (Kyōto Zu Sōmokuroku p. 80, #7) In Japanese. Oriented with north to the left. Relief shown pictorially. Includes index. 1 map; 43 x 58 cm., folded in cover 16 x 8 cm. This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
